00027 //USE_LOCAL_STACK will avoid most (often all) dynamic memory allocations due to resizing in processCollision and MycollideTT
00028 #define USE_LOCAL_STACK 1

00030 btShapePairCallback gCompoundCompoundChildShapePairCallback = 0;

00032 btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm( const btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,bool isSwapped)
00033 :btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm(ci,body0Wrap,body1Wrap,isSwapped)
00034 {
00035 
00036         void* ptr = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btHashedSimplePairCache),16);
00037         m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache= new(ptr) btHashedSimplePairCache();
00038 
00039         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* col0ObjWrap = body0Wrap;
00040         btAssert (col0ObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->isCompound());
00041 
00042         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* col1ObjWrap = body1Wrap;
00043         btAssert (col1ObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->isCompound());
00044         
00045         const btCompoundShape* compoundShape0 = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(col0ObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00046         m_compoundShapeRevision0 = compoundShape0->getUpdateRevision();
00047 
00048         const btCompoundShape* compoundShape1 = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(col1ObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00049         m_compoundShapeRevision1 = compoundShape1->getUpdateRevision();
00050         
00051         
00052 }

00055 btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::~btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm()
00056 {
00057         removeChildAlgorithms();
00058         m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache->~btHashedSimplePairCache();
00059         btAlignedFree(m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void    btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::getAllContactManifolds(btManifoldArray&   manifoldArray)
00063 {
00064         int i;
00065         btSimplePairArray& pairs = m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache->getOverlappingPairArray();
00066         for (i=0;i<pairs.size();i++)
00067         {
00068                 if (pairs[i].m_userPointer)
00069                 {
00070                         
00071                         ((btCollisionAlgorithm*)pairs[i].m_userPointer)->getAllContactManifolds(manifoldArray);
00072                 }
00073         }
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 void    btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::removeChildAlgorithms()
00078 {
00079         btSimplePairArray& pairs = m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache->getOverlappingPairArray();
00080 
00081         int numChildren = pairs.size();
00082         int i;
00083         for (i=0;i<numChildren;i++)
00084         {
00085                 if (pairs[i].m_userPointer)
00086                 {
00087                         btCollisionAlgorithm* algo = (btCollisionAlgorithm*) pairs[i].m_userPointer;
00088                         algo->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
00089                         m_dispatcher->freeCollisionAlgorithm(algo);
00090                 }
00091         }
00092         m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache->removeAllPairs();
00093 }

00095 struct  btCompoundCompoundLeafCallback : btDbvt::ICollide
00096 {
00097         int m_numOverlapPairs;
00098 
00099 
00100         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* m_compound0ColObjWrap;
00101         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* m_compound1ColObjWrap;
00102         btDispatcher* m_dispatcher;
00103         const btDispatcherInfo& m_dispatchInfo;
00104         btManifoldResult*       m_resultOut;
00105         
00106         
00107         class btHashedSimplePairCache*  m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache;
00108         
00109         btPersistentManifold*   m_sharedManifold;
00110         
00111         btCompoundCompoundLeafCallback (const btCollisionObjectWrapper* compound1ObjWrap,
00112                                                                         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* compound0ObjWrap,
00113                                                                         btDispatcher* dispatcher,
00114                                                                         const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,
00115                                                                         btManifoldResult*       resultOut,
00116                                                                         btHashedSimplePairCache* childAlgorithmsCache,
00117                                                                         btPersistentManifold*   sharedManifold)
00118                 :m_numOverlapPairs(0),m_compound0ColObjWrap(compound1ObjWrap),m_compound1ColObjWrap(compound0ObjWrap),m_dispatcher(dispatcher),m_dispatchInfo(dispatchInfo),m_resultOut(resultOut),
00119                 m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache(childAlgorithmsCache),
00120                 m_sharedManifold(sharedManifold)
00121         {
00122 
00123         }
00124

00126 
00127         
00128         void            Process(const btDbvtNode* leaf0,const btDbvtNode* leaf1)
00129         {
00130                 BT_PROFILE("btCompoundCompoundLeafCallback::Process");
00131                 m_numOverlapPairs++;
00132 
00133 
00134                 int childIndex0 = leaf0->dataAsInt;
00135                 int childIndex1 = leaf1->dataAsInt;
00136                 
00137 
00138                 btAssert(childIndex0>=0);
00139                 btAssert(childIndex1>=0);
00140 
00141 
00142                 const btCompoundShape* compoundShape0 = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(m_compound0ColObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00143                 btAssert(childIndex0<compoundShape0->getNumChildShapes());
00144 
00145                 const btCompoundShape* compoundShape1 = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(m_compound1ColObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00146                 btAssert(childIndex1<compoundShape1->getNumChildShapes());
00147 
00148                 const btCollisionShape* childShape0 = compoundShape0->getChildShape(childIndex0);
00149                 const btCollisionShape* childShape1 = compoundShape1->getChildShape(childIndex1);
00150 
00151                 //backup
00152                 btTransform     orgTrans0 = m_compound0ColObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00153                 const btTransform& childTrans0 = compoundShape0->getChildTransform(childIndex0);
00154                 btTransform     newChildWorldTrans0 = orgTrans0*childTrans0 ;
00155                 
00156                 btTransform     orgTrans1 = m_compound1ColObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00157                 const btTransform& childTrans1 = compoundShape1->getChildTransform(childIndex1);
00158                 btTransform     newChildWorldTrans1 = orgTrans1*childTrans1 ;
00159                 
00160 
00161                 //perform an AABB check first
00162                 btVector3 aabbMin0,aabbMax0,aabbMin1,aabbMax1;
00163                 childShape0->getAabb(newChildWorldTrans0,aabbMin0,aabbMax0);
00164                 childShape1->getAabb(newChildWorldTrans1,aabbMin1,aabbMax1);
00165                 
00166                 btVector3 thresholdVec(m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold, m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold, m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold);
00167 
00168                 aabbMin0 -= thresholdVec;
00169                 aabbMax0 += thresholdVec;
00170 
00171                 if (gCompoundCompoundChildShapePairCallback)
00172                 {
00173                         if (!gCompoundCompoundChildShapePairCallback(childShape0,childShape1))
00174                                 return;
00175                 }
00176 
00177                 if (TestAabbAgainstAabb2(aabbMin0,aabbMax0,aabbMin1,aabbMax1))
00178                 {
00179                         btCollisionObjectWrapper compoundWrap0(this->m_compound0ColObjWrap,childShape0, m_compound0ColObjWrap->getCollisionObject(),newChildWorldTrans0,-1,childIndex0);
00180                         btCollisionObjectWrapper compoundWrap1(this->m_compound1ColObjWrap,childShape1,m_compound1ColObjWrap->getCollisionObject(),newChildWorldTrans1,-1,childIndex1);
00181                         
00182 
00183                         btSimplePair* pair = m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache->findPair(childIndex0,childIndex1);
00184 
00185                         btCollisionAlgorithm* colAlgo = 0;
00186                         if (m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold > 0)
00187                         {
00188                                 colAlgo = m_dispatcher->findAlgorithm(&compoundWrap0, &compoundWrap1, 0, BT_CLOSEST_POINT_ALGORITHMS);
00189                         }
00190                         else
00191                         {
00192                                 if (pair)
00193                                 {
00194                                         colAlgo = (btCollisionAlgorithm*)pair->m_userPointer;
00195 
00196                                 }
00197                                 else
00198                                 {
00199                                         colAlgo = m_dispatcher->findAlgorithm(&compoundWrap0, &compoundWrap1, m_sharedManifold, BT_CONTACT_POINT_ALGORITHMS);
00200                                         pair = m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache->addOverlappingPair(childIndex0, childIndex1);
00201                                         btAssert(pair);
00202                                         pair->m_userPointer = colAlgo;
00203                                 }
00204                         }
00205 
00206                         btAssert(colAlgo);
00207                                                 
00208                         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* tmpWrap0 = 0;
00209                         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* tmpWrap1 = 0;
00210 
00211                         tmpWrap0 = m_resultOut->getBody0Wrap();
00212                         tmpWrap1 = m_resultOut->getBody1Wrap();
00213 
00214                         m_resultOut->setBody0Wrap(&compoundWrap0);
00215                         m_resultOut->setBody1Wrap(&compoundWrap1);
00216 
00217                         m_resultOut->setShapeIdentifiersA(-1,childIndex0);
00218                         m_resultOut->setShapeIdentifiersB(-1,childIndex1);
00219 
00220 
00221                         colAlgo->processCollision(&compoundWrap0,&compoundWrap1,m_dispatchInfo,m_resultOut);
00222                         
00223                         m_resultOut->setBody0Wrap(tmpWrap0);
00224                         m_resultOut->setBody1Wrap(tmpWrap1);
00225                         
00226 
00227 
00228                 }
00229         }
00230 };

00233 static DBVT_INLINE bool         MyIntersect(    const btDbvtAabbMm& a,
00234                                                                   const btDbvtAabbMm& b, const btTransform& xform, btScalar distanceThreshold)
00235 {
00236         btVector3 newmin,newmax;
00237         btTransformAabb(b.Mins(),b.Maxs(),0.f,xform,newmin,newmax);
00238         newmin -= btVector3(distanceThreshold, distanceThreshold, distanceThreshold);
00239         newmax += btVector3(distanceThreshold, distanceThreshold, distanceThreshold);
00240         btDbvtAabbMm newb = btDbvtAabbMm::FromMM(newmin,newmax);
00241         return Intersect(a,newb);
00242 }

00244 
00245 static inline void              MycollideTT(    const btDbvtNode* root0,
00246                                                                   const btDbvtNode* root1,
00247                                                                   const btTransform& xform,
00248                                                                   btCompoundCompoundLeafCallback* callback, btScalar distanceThreshold)
00249 {
00250 
00251                 if(root0&&root1)
00252                 {
00253                         int                                                             depth=1;
00254                         int                                                             treshold=btDbvt::DOUBLE_STACKSIZE-4;
00255                         btAlignedObjectArray<btDbvt::sStkNN>    stkStack;
00256 #ifdef USE_LOCAL_STACK
00257                         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvt::sStkNN localStack[btDbvt::DOUBLE_STACKSIZE]);
00258                         stkStack.initializeFromBuffer(&localStack,btDbvt::DOUBLE_STACKSIZE,btDbvt::DOUBLE_STACKSIZE);
00259 #else
00260                         stkStack.resize(btDbvt::DOUBLE_STACKSIZE);
00261 #endif
00262                         stkStack[0]=btDbvt::sStkNN(root0,root1);
00263                         do      {
00264                                 btDbvt::sStkNN  p=stkStack[--depth];
00265                                 if(MyIntersect(p.a->volume,p.b->volume,xform, distanceThreshold))
00266                                 {
00267                                         if(depth>treshold)
00268                                         {
00269                                                 stkStack.resize(stkStack.size()*2);
00270                                                 treshold=stkStack.size()-4;
00271                                         }
00272                                         if(p.a->isinternal())
00273                                         {
00274                                                 if(p.b->isinternal())
00275                                                 {                                       
00276                                                         stkStack[depth++]=btDbvt::sStkNN(p.a->childs[0],p.b->childs[0]);
00277                                                         stkStack[depth++]=btDbvt::sStkNN(p.a->childs[1],p.b->childs[0]);
00278                                                         stkStack[depth++]=btDbvt::sStkNN(p.a->childs[0],p.b->childs[1]);
00279                                                         stkStack[depth++]=btDbvt::sStkNN(p.a->childs[1],p.b->childs[1]);
00280                                                 }
00281                                                 else
00282                                                 {
00283                                                         stkStack[depth++]=btDbvt::sStkNN(p.a->childs[0],p.b);
00284                                                         stkStack[depth++]=btDbvt::sStkNN(p.a->childs[1],p.b);
00285                                                 }
00286                                         }
00287                                         else
00288                                         {
00289                                                 if(p.b->isinternal())
00290                                                 {
00291                                                         stkStack[depth++]=btDbvt::sStkNN(p.a,p.b->childs[0]);
00292                                                         stkStack[depth++]=btDbvt::sStkNN(p.a,p.b->childs[1]);
00293                                                 }
00294                                                 else
00295                                                 {
00296                                                         callback->Process(p.a,p.b);
00297                                                 }
00298                                         }
00299                                 }
00300                         } while(depth);
00301                 }
00302 }
00303 
00304 void btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::processCollision (const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00305 {
00306 
00307         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* col0ObjWrap = body0Wrap;
00308         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* col1ObjWrap= body1Wrap;
00309 
00310         btAssert (col0ObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->isCompound());
00311         btAssert (col1ObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->isCompound());
00312         const btCompoundShape* compoundShape0 = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(col0ObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00313         const btCompoundShape* compoundShape1 = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(col1ObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00314 
00315         const btDbvt* tree0 = compoundShape0->getDynamicAabbTree();
00316         const btDbvt* tree1 = compoundShape1->getDynamicAabbTree();
00317         if (!tree0 || !tree1)
00318         {
00319                 return btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::processCollision(body0Wrap,body1Wrap,dispatchInfo,resultOut);
00320         }
00323         if ((compoundShape0->getUpdateRevision() != m_compoundShapeRevision0) || (compoundShape1->getUpdateRevision() != m_compoundShapeRevision1))
00324         {
00326                 removeChildAlgorithms();
00327                 m_compoundShapeRevision0 = compoundShape0->getUpdateRevision();
00328                 m_compoundShapeRevision1 = compoundShape1->getUpdateRevision();
00329 
00330         }
00331 
00332 
00336         {
00337                 int i;
00338                 btManifoldArray manifoldArray;
00339 #ifdef USE_LOCAL_STACK 
00340                 btPersistentManifold localManifolds[4];
00341                 manifoldArray.initializeFromBuffer(&localManifolds,0,4);
00342 #endif
00343                 btSimplePairArray& pairs = m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache->getOverlappingPairArray();
00344                 for (i=0;i<pairs.size();i++)
00345                 {
00346                         if (pairs[i].m_userPointer)
00347                         {
00348                                 btCollisionAlgorithm* algo = (btCollisionAlgorithm*) pairs[i].m_userPointer;
00349                                 algo->getAllContactManifolds(manifoldArray);
00350                                 for (int m=0;m<manifoldArray.size();m++)
00351                                 {
00352                                         if (manifoldArray[m]->getNumContacts())
00353                                         {
00354                                                 resultOut->setPersistentManifold(manifoldArray[m]);
00355                                                 resultOut->refreshContactPoints();
00356                                                 resultOut->setPersistentManifold(0);
00357                                         }
00358                                 }
00359                                 manifoldArray.resize(0);
00360                         }
00361                 }
00362         }
00363 
00364 
00365         
00366 
00367         btCompoundCompoundLeafCallback callback(col0ObjWrap,col1ObjWrap,this->m_dispatcher,dispatchInfo,resultOut,this->m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache,m_sharedManifold);
00368 
00369 
00370         const btTransform       xform=col0ObjWrap->getWorldTransform().inverse()*col1ObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00371         MycollideTT(tree0->m_root,tree1->m_root,xform,&callback, resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold);
00372 
00373         //printf("#compound-compound child/leaf overlap =%d                      \r",callback.m_numOverlapPairs);
00374 
00375         //remove non-overlapping child pairs
00376 
00377         {
00378                 btAssert(m_removePairs.size()==0);
00379 
00380                 //iterate over all children, perform an AABB check inside ProcessChildShape
00381                 btSimplePairArray& pairs = m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache->getOverlappingPairArray();
00382                 
00383                 int i;
00384                 btManifoldArray manifoldArray;
00385         
00386                 
00387 
00388         
00389         
00390         btVector3 aabbMin0,aabbMax0,aabbMin1,aabbMax1;        
00391         
00392                 for (i=0;i<pairs.size();i++)
00393                 {
00394                         if (pairs[i].m_userPointer)
00395                         {
00396                                 btCollisionAlgorithm* algo = (btCollisionAlgorithm*)pairs[i].m_userPointer;
00397 
00398                                 {
00399                                         btTransform     orgTrans0;
00400                                         const btCollisionShape* childShape0 = 0;
00401                                         
00402                                         btTransform     newChildWorldTrans0;
00403                                         btTransform     orgInterpolationTrans0;
00404                                         childShape0 = compoundShape0->getChildShape(pairs[i].m_indexA);
00405                                         orgTrans0 = col0ObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00406                                         orgInterpolationTrans0 = col0ObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00407                                         const btTransform& childTrans0 = compoundShape0->getChildTransform(pairs[i].m_indexA);
00408                                         newChildWorldTrans0 = orgTrans0*childTrans0 ;
00409                                         childShape0->getAabb(newChildWorldTrans0,aabbMin0,aabbMax0);
00410                                 }
00411                                 btVector3 thresholdVec(resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold, resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold, resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold);
00412                                 aabbMin0 -= thresholdVec;
00413                                 aabbMax0 += thresholdVec;
00414                                 {
00415                                         btTransform     orgInterpolationTrans1;
00416                                         const btCollisionShape* childShape1 = 0;
00417                                         btTransform     orgTrans1;
00418                                         btTransform     newChildWorldTrans1;
00419 
00420                                         childShape1 = compoundShape1->getChildShape(pairs[i].m_indexB);
00421                                         orgTrans1 = col1ObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00422                                         orgInterpolationTrans1 = col1ObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00423                                         const btTransform& childTrans1 = compoundShape1->getChildTransform(pairs[i].m_indexB);
00424                                         newChildWorldTrans1 = orgTrans1*childTrans1 ;
00425                                         childShape1->getAabb(newChildWorldTrans1,aabbMin1,aabbMax1);
00426                                 }
00427                                 
00428                                 aabbMin1 -= thresholdVec;
00429                                 aabbMax1 += thresholdVec;
00430 
00431                                 if (!TestAabbAgainstAabb2(aabbMin0,aabbMax0,aabbMin1,aabbMax1))
00432                                 {
00433                                         algo->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
00434                                         m_dispatcher->freeCollisionAlgorithm(algo);
00435                                         m_removePairs.push_back(btSimplePair(pairs[i].m_indexA,pairs[i].m_indexB));
00436                                 }
00437                         }
00438                 }
00439                 for (int i=0;i<m_removePairs.size();i++)
00440                 {
00441                         m_childCollisionAlgorithmCache->removeOverlappingPair(m_removePairs[i].m_indexA,m_removePairs[i].m_indexB);
00442                 }
00443                 m_removePairs.clear();
00444         }
00445 
00446 }

00448 btScalar        btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::calculateTimeOfImpact(btCollisionObject* body0,btCollisionObject* body1,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00449 {
00450         btAssert(0);
00451         return 0.f;
00452 
00453 }
